---
title: Dark Theme
description:  Adding dark mode to your App
---
## setup
```dart
 import "./themes/app_theme.dart";// [!code highlight]

 void main() {
   runApp(MyApp());
 }


 class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
   @override
   Widget build(BuildContext context) {
     return MaterialApp(
       title: 'Flutter Demo',
       theme: FlutcnTheme.darkTheme(), // [!code highlight]
       home: const MyHomePage(title: 'Flutter Demo Home Page'),
     );
   }
 }
```
## Note 
press hot reload and you will see the dark theme applied to your app.
